_sText:
Like I said in the last release here on FPSBanana, there are 30 or so spawn points (15 for each team), but i would only recommend having about 16 players due to crowding.

I may have left a few things out of this list.  Especially considering that I never released Beta2 here on fpsbanana.  So there are some changes that were made between v1o2b and Beta2 that won't be listed here.  But I really hope you guys enjoy my map.  I love knowing that I have contributed to the fun times of the CS surfing community.  <3!

Surf_Ch33s3r_Beta3 Release Notes
--------------------------------
Added push trigger to bottom of hole in pyramid to prevent camping

Added a few teleport labels

Fixed problem where you could take damage from the "O" (If you don't know what this means, ignore it ;))

Fixed CT and T spawn portal mismatch

Fixed jail triggers next to main ramp so they don't tele you to jail just from getting close to the edge

Fixed problem where you could see feet/shadows of players inside the secret room (hopefully)

Fixed an exploit that provided a much easier route to the secret room

Changed kill triggers to jail triggers

Changed water textures (other than jail water) to look translucent instead of looking black

Changed jail so that prisoners cannot see players on top of the secret area

Changed the exterior jail wall facing the "top" to allow all types of ammunition to penetrate

Changed jail doors
